para_sentences.para_0: Certain exercises in the Exploration pages are sourced from Algorithms by Jeff Erickson under the Creative Commons 4.0 Attribution License.
para_sentences.para_1: Please contact the instructor if you have any questions about the copyright and ownership of materials presented in this course.

ul_0: The materials on this course website are only for the use of students enrolled in this course for purposes associated with this course and may not be retained or further disseminated
Course materials are cited within the Syllabus and Modules based on the copyright policy of each item
When copyright permission is required  Ecampus has contacted the copyright owner
When a fair use determination has been made  this has been documented
Images that are not cited have been obtained from the public domain or via a paid subscription or are images taken by the instructor
